text: The police on Sunday arrested a 42-year-old worker on charges of sexual assault of a Standard VI student in Rasipuram. S. Baskar of Erode was married and has two children. On Sunday, he went to meet his friend where he lured the girl. He sexually assaulted the girl. Neighbours caught him and handed over to the Rasipuram police. Based on a complaint, the police registered a case and arrested him. A medical examination was done on the girl at District Government Headquarters Hospital in Namakkal.
title: Man held for sexual assault
